tool_description: Travelopro provides online travel booking solution and APIs for flights, hotels, cars , transfers, sightseeing etc. and can manage own inventory products of travel agency. It eliminates manual processing tasks.
name: Travelo Pro
title: Travelo Pro

api_list.name: Travel Technology
api_list.description: Travelopro provides travel API integration, third party API integration, xml API integration services for hotels, flights, car rentals, holiday packages and many more.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://travelo-pro.p.rapidapi.comhttps://www.travelopro.com/api.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "travelo-pro.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
